MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault in SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch, affecting properties in Queens Road, Salisbury Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.55PM. Our engineers are on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we expect the power to be restored by 12AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:03PM on 27th January 2021
